failure.message:
1. Test Case ID: 8Rm1E8
- Response violates schema
'2024-01-31T13:31:27.737747' is not a 'date-time'
Schema at /properties/created_at/anyOf/0:
{ "type": "string", "format": "date-time" }
Value:
"2024-01-31T13:31:27.737747"
- Missing header not rejected
Missing header not rejected (got 200, expected 401)
[200] OK:
`{"countries":[],"reasons":[],"from_height":"7 feet 8 inches","to_height":"4 feet 1 inches","from_age":18,"to_age":58,"religions":["Others","Judaism","Hinduism","Others","Hinduism"],"ethnicities":["Asian","Asian"],"marital_type":"Monogamy","body_types":[],"drinking_statuses":[],"smoking_statuses":[],"education_levels":[],"has_children":["Yes but all grown","Yes but all grown"],"want_children":[],"open_for_relocation":"No","user_id":"5680f8fff33247eab9f20326e019be9c","updated_at":"2025-07-05T20:51:53.185945Z" // Output truncated...`
Reproduce with:
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"body_types": null, "countries": [], "drinking_statuses": null, "education_levels": null, "ethnicities": null, "from_age": null, "from_height": null, "has_children": null, "marital_type": null, "open_for_relocation": null, "reasons": null, "religions": null, "smoking_statuses": null, "to_age": null, "to_height": null, "want_children": null}' https://test-v2.tramatch.com/api/recommendations/v2/preferences/
2. Test Case ID: bZbn25
- API accepts requests without authentication
Expected 401, got `403 Forbidden` for `PUT /api/recommendations/v2/preferences/`
[403] Forbidden:
`{"detail":"User Not authenticated"}`
Reproduce with:
curl -X PUT -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"body_types": null, "countries": [], "drinking_statuses": null, "education_levels": null, "ethnicities": null, "from_age": null, "from_height": null, "has_children": null, "marital_type": null, "open_for_relocation": null, "reasons": null, "religions": null, "smoking_statuses": null, "to_age": null, "to_height": null, "want_children": null}' https://test-v2.tramatch.com/api/recommendations/v2/preferences/
